issue.title: [Rust] Implement Duration and Interval Arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5366](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5366). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should ideally include covering:
 \* data types
 \* arrays and builders
 \* adding to kernels (e.g. including support in cast)

comments.body:
